Package oracle.jbo.uicli.controls

Contains classes that implement ADF Swing controls

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JClientPanel This interface identifies a JClient Panel for JDeveloper designtime, so that the JDeveloper UI Designer can allow JClient Data Model editors to be part of the Property Inspector for the control's model property.
JUArrayElementEditorInterface This interface defines the methods that is required by JUArrayComboBox to communicate with an editor that can edit an element/item in the JUArrayComboBox.
JUPanel This interface identifies a JClient Panel for JDeveloper designtime, so that the JDeveloper UI Designer can allow JClient Data Model editors to be part of the Property Inspector for the control's model property.
JURegionPanel This interface identifies a panel that can be used as a region in a table.
JUStatusBar.StatusBarControl  
 

Class Summary
dataPanel This class is used in JDeveloper DT.
JUArrayComboBox Extends a JComboBox to display data from a BC4J Array domain.
JUArrayComboBoxBeanInfo  
JUComboBox  
JUComboBoxLovEditButton This class combines a text box and a button, to be used with an LOV binding.
JUComboLovDialog  
JUErrorHandlerDlg Dialog that implements JUErrorHandler interface in the framework.
JULabel Implements a BC4J data bound JLabel subclass.
JULoginDlg A sample implemenation of log in dialog in the JClient framework.
JULovDialog  
JULovEditButton This class combines a text box and a button, to be used with an LOV binding.
JULovPanel  
JUMultiAttrListCellRenderer  
JUMultiAttrListEditor  
JUNavBarListener  
JUNavigationBar Implements a data-aware toolbar.
JURadioButtonGroupPanel  
JUShuttlePanel This class represents a shuttle panel.
JUStatusBar JUStatusBar
JUTableRegion This class implements a renderer/editor for a JTable.
JUTestFrame

Enum Summary
JUShuttlePanel.ActionType An enumeration of the various actions that can be invoked from the shuttle panel
JUShuttlePanel.ListType An enumeration of the (two) lists associated with the shuttle panel
 

Package oracle.jbo.uicli.controls Description

Contains classes that implement ADF Swing controls

Contains customized Swing controls and other UI classes that either implement ADF Swing interfaces or work with ADF Swing bindings to display/edit BC4J data.
